short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learn how to speak English while practicing speaking out loud.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Choose any text to speak out loud from any website, highlight any text, right-click, and open the app via the dropdown menu.

Click the Record button to record yourself speaking the selected text. The app will turn your speech into text and show you how exact was your reading.

Click any word to figure out how it should be pronounced correctly.

You can reset to start again or just select a new text to speak.
